price: "Por certo, vós vos achegais aos homens por lascívia, ao invés de às mulheres. Sois, aliás, um povo entregue a excessos"
arabic: إِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهۡوَةٗ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ مُّسۡرِفُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: innakum latatūna al-rijāla shahwatan min dūni al-nisāi bal antum qawmun mus'rifūna
